{% macro feedThumbnail(item) %} {% if options.thumbnail %} {% if aposAreaImage(item, 'thumbnail') %} {# Most but not all feed readers will ignore the float, but it's nice to try. #} {% elif options.alternateThumbnail and aposAreaImage(item, 'body') %} {# Most but not all feed readers will ignore the float, but it's nice to try. #} {% endif %} {% endif %} {% endmacro %} {% macro feedBody(item) %} {% if options.summary %} {{ aposAreaPlaintext({ area: item.body, truncate: options.characters }) | e }} {% else %} {# This helper is good for bypassing all the outer wrapper markup of an area which is #} {# unsuitable for RSS feeds #} {# Ignore all widgets, simple HTML text only #} {{ aposAreaContent(item.body.items or [], { allowed: [ 'richText' ] }) }} {% endif %} {% endmacro %}
